1551299295_131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5.body:
Hope you enjoy this bit of code.

This code as shown below will allow a person to insert a video with full controls into a website / blog. Simply click new blog post and click the little </> html insert and just paste it in. I pulled it from W3 Schools - https://www.w3schools.com/tags/av_event_seeking.asp

<video id="myVideo" width="640" height="320" controls>
  <source src="YOUR_SOURCE_HERE.WHATEVER" type="video/mp4">
  Your browser does not support HTML5 video.
</video>
<script> 
var vid = document.getElementById("myVideo"); 
</script>

> [ilovealtoids](#comment_1_17pmbNMUtniJ4cTr1czysijJjPnYngg93s): Hope you enjoy this bit of code. [...]

BTW make sure you place a "/" in front of the video URL ie:

/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/merged-CDN/1MzV32sv55VSD5Vr7u3mcMPsX2oG9PHusr/data/users/12w3zJ6gRrcAw2kSCQXDkorgqxuXnkKkF8/BLADE_RUNNER_2049_-_2036_Nexus_Dawn_Short.mp4

So that it points relative to the person viewing it. (Their port number may be different)
If you have any questions just ask
